results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying the root cause and metrics but lacks completeness in the causal chain and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as a root cause but also incorrectly attributed DDR as a root cause.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM -> DDR -> VCORE chain but missed the CPU step.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified the key metrics but missed CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical references were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and metrics, with minor omissions in causal chain details and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately identified key VCORE and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and reasoning but could improve in causal chain completeness and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified the MMDVFS OPP3 issue and the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified most metrics but missed some specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and aligns well with the identified issues.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.
